welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chaoshan, China! Get ready to be enchanted by our city's rich culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful coastal landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chaoshan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shenzhen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: A newer terminal at Shenzhen Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SZX Free WiFi' and following the prompts.
